website_summaries.verdict: This durable platform provides free-flowing motion to give your workout new, multi-dimensional directions.
pros: Comes with bushings for 1-inch and 2-inch diameter to fit both standard and Olympic bars
Full 360 degree swivel and full range up and down motion
Can bolt to the floor or attach to power racks and wall
cons: Provided bolts do not always fit the pre-drilled holes correctly

customer_reviews.title: Good for home use
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy duty as the one at the gym, but not at that price point either. Time will tell if it holds up well enough to my moderate home use, but works well and installed easily by placing it under a weight tree. The base wasn't wide enough to go under some equipment, so keep this in mind or prepare to bolt it to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: lschofield

customer_reviews.title: Great for adding new exercises to workouts.
customer_reviews.text: Holds weight well, I’ve used this with 210 pounds for rows and it didn’t seem to bend or warp; I wish they would tell you the size of bolts you should buy to mount however. I’ve used it both attached to a rack or mounted to the floor and I prefer the floor, it’s a lot easier to use because instead of having to worry about counterweight you can get straight to your next set with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L.

customer_reviews.title: bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: The knob thats included doesn't fit any of the holes at the base. you must find/buy your own if you want to secure this to any rack.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Bass

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is intened for no problem, heavier than expected which is a good thing, more rugged. Welds, swivels and threads are all done right and the finish is really good and thorough.
customer_reviews.author: felipe

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This thing works, but the tube is short, so I prefer to use a different landmine instead. It is cheap, so my expectations were low, but I don't think I would buy it again. The base plate bent early on and the bar just doesn't feel secure in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepnick

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a must have for a home gym. - Fits Titan T2 Power Rack 2x2. - Construction is solid, Holes in alignment. - Powder coat and finish is superb. - Fits Olympic barbells with some play, but the included screw will hold the barbell in place. *Please note the screw used to secure barbell Can be abrasive. - Fast shipping even through Corona virus lock down.
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I never thought something so small and simple would have such a dramatic impact on my workouts. I find a way to work this into every workout day because it hits muscles in a different way than just lifting the bar does. So far, it seems well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie B.

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: Holding up pretty well after a few weeks of use. Just make sure to tighten down the knob on the barbell so that it doesn't slip out.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and exceptionally versitile
customer_reviews.text: This simple addition to my home gym opened up a whole new realm of exercises and it was nothing to add to my weight bench
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: #sofunctional!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it can fit without notice and can accomodate both small and olympic size bars!! Did I mention it can rotate!!
customer_reviews.author: Yolande

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Attached it to a leg press machine base. It is awesome! Way better than sticking the barbell in the corner with a carpet or towel to protect the walls!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Wayne Kidd Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to my Weight Room
customer_reviews.text: I secured it under my Olympic Weight Bench and it works perfectly. Very happy with my investment.
customer_reviews.author: Ragu

customer_reviews.title: Great attachment
customer_reviews.text: Really liking this attachment, it moves around a lot even when tightened down. But it does the job and gives me several workouts options in one spot.
customer_reviews.author: Molon Labe .308

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my home gym. Good quality craftsmanship and quick delivery
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Goodcat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Good alternative to t bar rows, works lats, middle traps, rhomboids
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for what I bought it for. Well constructed, swivels & moves freely. Will see how it holds up over time
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mike

customer_reviews.title: T-bar/landmine
customer_reviews.text: Fits onto my weight rack tubing and works well. I find no problems or complaints.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is much more heavy duty than I expected for the price. Lifted up my power rack, slid this under the square tube and tightened down the screw. Now its stable and smooth. a cheap way to expand the home gym and add a bunch of new exercises. Very Happy!
customer_reviews.author: jeff m.

customer_reviews.title: Great for limited space.
customer_reviews.text: The head swivels 360 degrees so I can put this under my power rack and use it from any angle. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Atypical-guy

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical but the land mind works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and looks good attached to the squat rack!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am going to be like Octimus Prime with this transformation!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you measure first
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. Took me about five minutes to install it. Make sure you measure where you want to install it. My rack is about an 1/8" too wide so I did have to get the hammer out and widen the little sleeves so that it would slide onto the rack. Other than that it works great
customer_reviews.author: Shawn b.

customer_reviews.title: T-Bar Rows at Home
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I stumbled across this item. This piece of equipment allows me to do t-bar rows at home. I simply attached it to the base of my weight rack and inserted a bar.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome with the CAP Rack system
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome with the CAP Rack system. This little tools adds bunch of diferrent workouts back, chest, and shoulder. Must have at the gum.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: So far it’s great 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should, no problems at all great for all T-bar workouts.
customer_reviews.author: TKav

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I love it, a perfect addition to the home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy and it will accommodate standard and Olympic bars
customer_reviews.text: Well made, very sturdy and it will accommodate standard and Olympic bars.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Only reason I didn’t give it five stars is because ...
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I didn’t give it five stars is because the holes on the hold down weren’t tapped correctly . Other than that it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Penny

customer_reviews.title: Very super happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bloody solid and heavy duty - much so then i initially thought. Very super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Added to my home gym rack. Works perfectly and is a great addition to my home gym, allowing me to add many more exercises to my workouts. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mario H. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked as directed in our home gym. Hubby loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my home gym
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my home gym. Well built, robust and easy to setup. I have a CAP rack. This added a completely new dimension to my workouts. I also bought a CAP Double D handle for rowing exercises on the landmine. For build quality, price and utility this receives 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Thor

customer_reviews.title: good one
customer_reviews.text: Good for garage gym Hopefully I will build more muscle than what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Work great with the small bar. Happy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It does what it’s supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, and you can use it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Hamo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome just what I was looking for. Caw sooner than I thought. Now I can grow my exercise more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This allows for a great movement when doing standing shoulder presses, squats as well as back rows. It is well made and the range of motion is fantastic. I get a great pump when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: A Purchase Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm! Super easy to install, and ready to go right out the box!
customer_reviews.author: Rahz

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely surprised at it's quality for the price. This thing is heavy and well built. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love these! We have 4 of them and they work great
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on my power racks, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. I use it 2-3 times per week
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I use it 2-3 times per week, and it has held up really well, it pivots smoothly and has allowed me to add challenging elements to my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: T-bar Row review
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this for our home gym. This piece works well and the quality is excellent. It holds our barbell without any problems. Now we can work our back muscles! 👍🏻😀
customer_reviews.author: Signe Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Fast set-up, works.
customer_reviews.text: Great for landmines and T-bar rows. Used it today, stays attached to the power rack with a bar in it.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Easy to use. Attached to my weight rack and was a perfect fit and didn’t shift!

customer_reviews.title: Awsome T-Bar row holder
customer_reviews.text: This works great ,glad it has the ability to swivel and accept both Bars.

customer_reviews.title: I love my t-bar...
customer_reviews.text: It’s like being in the gym instead I’m at home using the t-bar working out...

customer_reviews.title: Well made for the money
customer_reviews.text: Wish I bought this over year ago... Well worth the cost.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Use with or without the cuff and links. It made a back workout easy without any pulleys or dumbells.

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2" olympic bar
customer_reviews.text: This was great addition to my home gym, i'm able to do all kinds of exercises,

customer_reviews.title: Recommend

customer_reviews.text: It came in fast. Fit under my squat rack Perfect works excellent.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This products the same as the more expensive ones with same guarantee, no issues

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Considered building one till I found this ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Considered building one till I found this for under 30$! I use my garage door to hold it in place works great!

customer_reviews.title: Nice finish/paint. Good landmine device and economical
customer_reviews.text: Solid piece of equipment. Nice finish/paint. Good landmine device and economical.

customer_reviews.text: The product was sent quickly and was exactly what I hoped for!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! I was skeptical for years about this ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I was skeptical for years about this product but now regret that I waited. It works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install best deal for the price fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Quiroz

customer_reviews.title: Screw hole painted threads no good
customer_reviews.text: When they sprayed this with paint in china they were too lazy to cover the threaded holes to keep the paint out of the threads. The locking knobs will not start to thread into the frame. I got my old USA MADE crapsman tap and die set and fixed the problem. I should have just sent it back and let the seller send me a new one.
customer_reviews.author: SNOWFLAKESMELTING

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a few uses. Bolt holding piece together snapped.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: - This T-bar row platform is compatible with my - It is compatible with both olympic bars and the skinnier bar - Swivel turns 360 degrees that allows me to do exercises anywhere that has space - Seems like pretty good quality built, it allows me to do more exercises

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! easy to install. Works well when i put under pressure. I can do multiple excersises

product_meta.title: A2ZCARE Deluxe T-Bar Row Platform - Full 360° Swivel for Easy Use in Small Spaces – Fits 1-inch Standard & 2-inch Olympic Bars
feature_bullets: Made of top-quality solid steel and covered by ELECTROSTATIC POWDER COATING-which can create a thick cover to protect it better from being hit, scratched or damaged by force or environment; besides, it does not contain any solvents which can harm the health due to its evaporation. The platform contact to floor is constructed of heavy gauge steel, together with dual bronze Oil-Lite bushings, brings the durability to the product, so it is able to avoid any corrosion

There are several holes to bolt to the floor, coming with 2 secure tighten knob: one on rear mount allows you to attach easily to Power Racks/ Wall, and one on bushings helps to tightly lock 2” Olympic Bars, which makes it extremely steady and ensures your safety during the workout.

Includes 2 bushings, with diameter 1” and 2” that can fit with any Standard and Olympic Bars respectively. Its highlight is the full 360 degree swivel and full range swivel up and down, so it give you multi-direction workout that impact on all the major muscles in your back, shoulder and the pulling muscles in your arms.

Compact and multi-function design gives you an optimum fitness space, ensure the flexibility in different exercises, perfect for both workout at home and at gym; with our platform, only with a small space, you can totally experience back exercises effectively no matter where you are.
We stand behind the quality of our products, and guarantee for good: LIFETIME WARRANTY AND 60-DAY FREE RETURN. Help you enjoy experiences with your landmine.
